channel.title: What do YOU look for in a PK server?
channel.description:
Title says it all.
When looking for a PK server to play, what would be the qualitys you look for in one?
Mine would be Flawless Wildy PK :P
Post yours.

item.title: What do YOU look for in a PK server?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

No dragon claws, no god swords, no over-powered weapons, no ::pickup or any item-giving commands of the sort, and a combat system that isn’t shitty.

Read full topic
item.source: What do YOU look for in a PK server?

item.title: What do YOU look for in a PK server?
item.dc:creator: @Kieron532 Kieron532
item.description:
@Kieron532 wrote:

Against the rules? Not allowed to post question threads here?

I saw another guy post a question thread “What are you listening too?”

If its against the rules i have no objection to a mod locking the thread

Read full topic
item.source: What do YOU look for in a PK server?

item.title: What do YOU look for in a PK server?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

I’m pretty sure this is against the rules.

But, no dragon claws, and good combat (Proj Insanity or self written)

Read full topic
